languages.text: За небрежение, проявленное семейством Гапрак и приведшее к осквернению колонии Кьява Гамма, великие богатства данного рода будут реквизированы в пользу казны Вольного Торговца.
As punishment for House Gaprak's negligence that led to the corruption of Kiava Gamma, the house's considerable wealth will be requisitioned by the Rogue Trader's treasury.
languages.original_text: За небрежение, проявленное семейством Гапрак и приведшее к осквернению колонии Кьява Гамма, великие богатства данного рода будут реквизированы в пользу казны Вольного Торговца.

traits.locale_text: As punishment for House Gaprak's negligence that led to the corruption of Kiava Gamma, the house's considerable wealth will be requisitioned by the Rogue Trader's treasury.

As punishment for House Gaprak's negligence that led to the corruption of Kiava Gamma, the house's considerable wealth will be requisitioned by the Rogue Trader's treasury.

languages.text: Als Bestrafung für Nachlässigkeit des Hauses Gaprak, die zur Verderbnis von Kiava Gamma geführt hat, wird der beträchtliche Wohlstand des Hauses von der Schatzkammer {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} requiriert.
languages.original_text: As punishment for House Gaprak's negligence that led to the corruption of Kiava Gamma, the house's considerable wealth will be requisitioned by the Rogue Trader's treasury.

traits.locale_text: Als Bestrafung für Nachlässigkeit des Hauses Gaprak, die zur Verderbnis von Kiava Gamma geführt hat, wird der beträchtliche Wohlstand des Hauses von der Schatzkammer {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} requiriert.

languages.text: En guise de châtiment contre les Gaprak, dont la négligence a abouti à la corruption de Kiava Gamma, la richesse considérable de la maison sera confisquée au profit {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}.
languages.original_text: As punishment for House Gaprak's negligence that led to the corruption of Kiava Gamma, the house's considerable wealth will be requisitioned by the Rogue Trader's treasury.

traits.locale_text: En guise de châtiment contre les Gaprak, dont la négligence a abouti à la corruption de Kiava Gamma, la richesse considérable de la maison sera confisquée au profit {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}.

languages.text: キアヴァ・ガンマの腐敗を招いたガプラック家の怠慢に対する罰として、同家の巨万の富はローグトレーダーの国庫に徴発された。
languages.original_text: As punishment for House Gaprak's negligence that led to the corruption of Kiava Gamma, the house's considerable wealth will be requisitioned by the Rogue Trader's treasury.

traits.locale_text: キアヴァ・ガンマの腐敗を招いたガプラック家の怠慢に対する罰として、同家の巨万の富はローグトレーダーの国庫に徴発された。

languages.text: Como castigo por la negligencia de la casa Gaprak, que llevó a Kiava Gamma a la corrupción, la tesorería de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente requisará la considerable riqueza de la casa.
languages.original_text: As punishment for House Gaprak's negligence that led to the corruption of Kiava Gamma, the house's considerable wealth will be requisitioned by the Rogue Trader's treasury.

traits.locale_text: Como castigo por la negligencia de la casa Gaprak, que llevó a Kiava Gamma a la corrupción, la tesorería de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente requisará la considerable riqueza de la casa.

languages.text: 由于贾帕克家族的疏忽，基亚瓦伽马星遭到了腐化。作为惩罚，这个家族可观的财富将会被行商浪人的国库征用。
languages.original_text: As punishment for House Gaprak's negligence that led to the corruption of Kiava Gamma, the house's considerable wealth will be requisitioned by the Rogue Trader's treasury.

traits.locale_text: 由于贾帕克家族的疏忽，基亚瓦伽马星遭到了腐化。作为惩罚，这个家族可观的财富将会被行商浪人的国库征用。

languages.text: Gösterdikleri ihtiyatsızlıktan dolayı Kiava Gama'nın yozlaşmasına yol açan Gaprak Hanesi'nin mal varlığından kayda değer bir miktar Hür Tacir'in hazinesine aktarılacak.
languages.original_text: As punishment for House Gaprak's negligence that led to the corruption of Kiava Gamma, the house's considerable wealth will be requisitioned by the Rogue Trader's treasury.
